column2: we sincerely appreciate your candid review. We want our guests to have an enjoyable brunch
column3: and it's very helpful to know what more we could've done to achieve that. We're pleased that you appreciated the amount of flavor in your dishes and will share what needs adjusting to really wow you with your kitchen team. column4: please consider reaching out to our Assistant Director of Operations
